mapper.insert: insert into day_event(id ,title, date, start_time, end_time, description, family_id, family_member_id, user_id, importance, is_done) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{date,jdbcType=DATE}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{familyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{familyMemberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{importance,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isDone,jdbcType=TINYINT})
